code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import Masonry from"masonry-layout";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Favorites=()=>{const[favorites,setFavorites]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const getFavorites=async()=>{let host="http://localhost:3001";if(window.location.host.indexOf("christisfavoritethings.com")!==-1){host="https://christi-capstone-backend.fly.dev";}const response=await fetch("".concat(host,"/favorites"));const data=await response.json();setFavorites(data.favorites);setTimeout(()=>{const msnry=new Masonry(".grid",{itemSelector:".grid-item"});},500);console.log(data);};getFavorites();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid",children:favorites.map(favorite=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:favorite.imageURL,className:"card-img-top",alt:"Picture of Favorite Things"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"card-title",children:[favorite.category," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),favorite.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:favorite.summary}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:favorite.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:favorite.links,target:"_blank",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Learn more"})})]})]})},favorite.id);})});};export default Favorites;
